column1: extra_funding_on_desc;Our treasury is full of abundance
column2:
we should fund certain cultural curiosities


?RIf our treasury drops below 50k we will stop funding our projects!
 ;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: extra_funding_off_desc;We don't need to waste our money on fruitless efforts;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
deify_hanno_on_desc;The Cult of Hanno teaches and encourages migration to new lands
column2: to new colonies. Now is a good time to subtly encourage their worship to help us with further colonization;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: deify_hanno_off_desc;We have no more need for the Cult of Hanno at this time
column2: we should pass laws restricting their influence once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: convert_neterist_desc;§GThis decision will greatly increase your assimilation of the Kemetic culture! (400%)\n\n§!It's proven rather difficult to assimilate the Kemetic people in our empire. After the initial attempts at Synchronization
column2: the Ptolemies have largely abandoned that effort in favor of maintaining Hellenic orthodoxy
column3: under the influence of the Archon of Athens. This clearly was a mistake: Only through synchronization can we truly create a new Dynasty to rival

column1: extra_funding_off_desc;We don't need to waste our money on fruitless efforts;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: once the greatest city on earth
column3: has been largely abandoned for other nearby cities
column4: such as Seleucia. It's monuments have fallen into disrepair
column5: but it's legacy is still alive in Mesopotamia. We should rebuild this once great City back to it's former glory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: CRO_inherits_ALB_desc;After the annhilation of Judea by the Seleucids
column2: many of the rival Diadochi accepted the fleeing Judeans
column3: hoping to use them as loyal warriors and subjects eager to reclaim their holy land. In a perverse act
column4: the Macedonians created a 'New Holy Land' for the Judeans in the former lands of Dardania. We must destroy this farce of a nation and expell the Judeans.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: CRO_Dacia_desc;§GThis decision will greatly increase your assimilation of the Dakijan Culture (200%)\n\n§!Our smartest anthropologists have proven without a shadow of a doubt (ignoring any evidence to the contrary) that the Dacians and our Illyrian people were once one and the same. The Dacians recently have come under cultural influence of the Slavic barbarians
column2: calling themselves 'Dakijans' now
column3: but we can easily remind them of our shared legacy by our shared language: The Sword.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ARM_Anatolian_desc;§GThis decision will greatly increase your assimilation of the Anatolian Culture (200%) but you will be locked out of taking another Culture decision for a few decades\n\n§!The question of expansion for the Armenian Kingdom is clear: Asia or Anatolia has been our natural expansion path for decades
column2: and many of our kin have already settled in this land.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ARM_Persian_desc;§GThis decision will greatly increase your assimilation of the Persian Culture (200%) but you will be locked out of taking another Culture decision for a few decades\n\n§!The question of expansion for the Armenian Kingdom is clear: We are the true inheritors of Darius' will
column2: not these Parthian usurpers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the 'New Romans' have abandoned their Latin heritage and language for the language of their Punic conquerors. But in Cisalpine Gaul
column3: we've kept our Italic tongue and Religion
column4: as much as we could. We are finally in a place to restore true Latin rule to Italy
column5: Glory to Rome!\n\n§GThis decision will greatly increase your assimilation of the Romqart (400%);;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_romqart_federation_desc;Following the collapse of the Carthaginian Empire
column2: the Rewmqart Federation was formed first as just a league of Punic Colonies in Italy to fend off the Gauls
column4: and Germans. It evolved and expanded
column5: but it's decentralized nature lead to it's collapse. Now
column6: we are in a position to claim it's legitimacy for our own: Glory to Rewm!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_iber_desc;The Barqanesh of Iberia and north Africa have long since been disunited. First
column2: under the Carthaginian yolk
column3: then the Suebian invaders pushed us further to the brink. We will be stronger together!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_suebi_death_desc;§GThis decision will greatly increase your assimilation of the Suebian Culture (200%)\n\n§!Most of the civilized world were able to fight off the horde of migrations of barbarians during the Century of Crisis
column2: but we were not so lucky as the Suebi turned out to be a cunning foe. They even converted and worship Punic gods
column3: fooling the rest of the civilized world to think they were not barbarians anymore. Now with our successful Reconquest of Iberia
column4: we can resettle and recivilze these lands.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: German Tribes attempted to migrate south to warmer lands. The farthest most got was Pannonia
column3: the rest were brutally slaughtered. We were one of the lucky few who managed to settle in a new land. But our German brothers back home are suffering
column4: languishing in stagnation and poverty. If anyone had the right to bring 'civilization' to the Germans

column1: suebi_iber_desc;The Celtiberians were rather easy to assimilate
column2: but the Barqanesh proved much more resistant to our rightful claim to these lands. Now though
column3: we've finally snuffed out any resistance.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sisters_of_tanit_reborn_title;Avenge the Massacre of Tanit's Virgins;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Civilized World extended much further north into Gaul. However
column3: the perfidious Gauls struck with fury
column5: including the peaceful virgins at the old Temple of Tanit in Alesia. The surviving members
column7: formed the miltant Sisters of Tanit
column8: dedicated to the destruction of the Gauls. Now that they've finally been destroyed
column9: they seek to helping us maintain the eternal subjugation of these vile people

column1: end_mauryan_collapse_desc;We can either wait for our situation to stabilize...or with an injection of cash we can purge the Bureaucratic class and replace them with more effective magistrates.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we've managed to stabilized and reconquer our old lands
column3: along with eliminating our rivals. Their lasting legacy still stains the land of India
column4: but Chandragupta's Legacy is greater than Alexander or Christ!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: KSH_inherits_KRA_desc;We must integrate the Silesian Tribe to centralize and legitimize our rule;;;;;;;;;;;;x
KSH_inherits_RUT_desc;We must integrate the Antes Tribes to centralize and legitimize our rule;;;;;;;;;;;;x
KSH_inherits_BYE_desc;We must integrate the Venetic Tribes to centralize and legitimize our rule;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Slavic people lived in harmony to the Elb River. However the belligerant Saxons and Goths forced us Eastward once more and destroyed the great temple to Svetovid. Now we are poised to rebuild it grander than ever before!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_ilkhan_desc;We should unite the Northern Turkic Tribes into one nation so we can move forward as one
column2: strong

column1: form_scythia_desc;The Turkic tribes who settled with the Scythians lived in harmony
column2: forming a hybrid culture. We should unite all the Southern Turks into one Scythian Horde.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: construct_motya_cothon_desc;Motya has long been an important Cothon
column2: but in recent years it's become woefully out of date compared to the Grand Cothon in Carthage. We should modernized this important port and raise it to the same importance;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_the_numidian_revolt_desc;§GThis decision will greatly increase your assimilation of the Numidian Culture (400%)\n\n§!With the final destruction of the Mauritanian Kingdom
column2: the Numidian revolt has lost it's steam. Now we should focus on making sure such a thing never happens again with aggressive education and settlement.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_gothic_empire_desc;The Northernmost Germanic people have started to wildly diverge from those in Germania Proper. We should protect our cultural divergence by forming an empire of own.;;;;;;;;;;;x
form_briton_desc;The Brythonic people have started to lag behind the rest of the Celtic world
column2: and the only way to protect our independance from encroaching influences is via a United Kingdom;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_nordgerm_desc;Germany has never been unified: But the encroaching influence of the 'civilized' world has forced our hands to confederate the tribes once and for all.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Ostgermanic tribes were united under a single
column4: empire of Donova. Now more than ever do we need to rebuild this grand empire.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: punic_industry_desc;We should encourage our various cities to adopt the Baalat Tanit
column2: this will increase our population's productivity;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: jihad_desc;It is clear that now is the time for us to declare a Jihad against the Infidels of the world. Alhamdulillah!;;;;;;;;;;;x
abrahamic_charity_desc;Charity is a commandment by our LORD YHWH/Allah
column2: but our populace has started to forsake this important virtue. We should remind them of their duty.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: polytheism_sync_desc;To help assimilate our newly conquered citizens
column2: we should integrate their gods into our pantheon.;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: christian_evangelism_on_desc;We should focus on spreading the Good News to the unbelievers in our realm. Christ is King!;;;;;;;;;;;x
christian_evangelism_off_desc;We can't keep the focus of conversion going any longer
column2: time to end it and focus on pressing Worldly Concerns.;;;;;;;;;;;x
